con:part.con:content: <definitions name="RsbMtomJobs" targetNamespace="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/jobs" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:jobs="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/jobs" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:types="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <types> <schema targetNamespace="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/jobs" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8888/api/soap/mtom-jobs?xsd=../schemas/soap-jobs-and-results.xsd"/> </schema> </types> <message name="JobResponse"> <part element="types:result" name="result"></part> </message> <message name="JobRequest"> <part element="types:job" name="job"></part> </message> <portType name="MtomJobProcessor"> <operation name="Process"> <input message="jobs:JobRequest" name="JobRequest"></input> <output message="jobs:JobResponse" name="JobResponse"></output> </operation> </portType> <binding name="MtomJobProcessorSoapBinding" type="jobs:MtomJobProcessor"> <soap12:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="Process"> <soap12:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <input name="JobRequest"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </input> <output name="JobResponse"> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="MtomJobService"> <port binding="jobs:MtomJobProcessorSoapBinding" name="MtomJobProcessorPort"> <soap12:address location="http://localhost:8888/api/soap/mtom-jobs"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

@author rsb.development@openanalytics.eu--> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" version="1.0" xmlns="http://soap.rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" xmlns:common="http://rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://rsb.openanalytics.eu/types" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8888/api/soap/mtom-jobs?xsd=common.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="payloadType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="data" type="xsd:base64Binary" xmime:expectedContentTypes="application/octet-stream"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="contentType" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="job" type="jobType"/> <xsd:complexType name="jobType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="applicationName" type="common:applicationNameType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="parameter"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="payload" type="payloadType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="result" type="resultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="resultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="applicationName" type="common:applicationNameType"/> <xsd:element name="jobId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="payload" type="payloadType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
